model_answer: The segment occurs in option A: [00:00:00 - 00:00:25].

The correct answer is D: [00:07:13 - 00:07:22]. In this segment, the narrator mentions that Jon Moxley made history by defeating Tetsuya Naito and then quotes Moxley saying he only needs one shot at the IWGP championship. The screen also displays the quote on a taped red paper during this time segment.
